tags: None
review:
*** ******* ** **** ********* *** **** *** ******* ** *********** ****************  I have had a great experience with him and post which , i have regularly started to take my parents to him for yearly consultation. 

Also, he was a gold medalist during his time and it totally reflects in his consultation.

I highly recommend Dr. Sandesh to everyone here.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Sandesh Prabhu is extremely erudite *** ************* ** *** ****** I approached him in October 2019 in a time of emergency (extreme chest pain). He saw that I was facing a life-threatening situation and he immediately recommended a stent procedure for me. He performed it on me as well. The procedure was a success. Thus he has given me a second life. Thereafter I have been under his supervision and have consulting him regularly (once in every 6 months or so). In these regular checkups, he has given a lot of valuable advise on several important health issues (most prominently how to keep my Diabetes under control). During my recent visit, he also recommended me an ECG and Echo tests once again (after nearly 3 years). When he saw the reports, I could finally see a great smile and a great sense of satisfaction on his face - which tells a great story. Dr. Sandesh Prabhu is no doubt a very great doctor. I am extremely happy to have been operated upon by him and am really grateful to him for all the valuable advise he has given. Apart from being a great doctor, he is also a very wonderful human being as well. I would be very happy to recommend him to anyone who needs to consult a specialist with regards to Diabetes and Cardiology related issues.

Once again, a great many thanks to Dr. Sandesh Prabhu for the wonderful treatment. A great many thanks also to Manipal Hospital (Whitefield).

Regards,
Ravindranath

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ************ * **** friendly Doctor, listen to our problems patiently and give confidence with his treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I'm writing this post for my wife who is having idiopathic PAH and on medicines.Her symptoms increased in last 20 days before I met Dr Sandesh Prabhu,whom I consider an incarnation of God now,he did minimum diagnosis himself,added one medicine and she got relief.Most importantly his caring,helping, positive orientation and constructive attitude for the betterment are to name of his few attributes.He has not only prescribed the medicine but also brought a new hope of living as normal a
human being soon.These stars and ratings are minimal to praise your magnanimous knowledge in this field.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Treadmill Test - TMT,BP Monitoring,Cardiac Procedure,2D - Echocardiography (2D-Echo),Cardiac checkup - General,
review:
This has been a very rewarding experience. 
I visited Dr. Sandesh upon seeing high inflammation markers (Hs CRP) on my blood test report. 

When I visited the doctor - his demeanour and friendly nature made me very comfortable even when he ordered for ECG, Echo and a TMT test. 

What was really heartening to see was the doctor himself carried out all procedures and went in detail of explaining what I am seeing and hearing in my tests. 

Before visiting the cardiologist I was filled with dread. But with his presence during the tests I felt safe. 

In the end I am grateful for the time invested in me and my health - his advice I’ll take upon strongly. 

He asked me to visit after 6M. This I shall do no matter which part of the country I shall be present in. 

Thank you Dr. Sandesh :)

review: Dr. Sandesh Prabhu is thorough in his approach and extremely polite and courteous in his communication, which gives satisfaction to the patient. I am on his prescribed medication for Lipid issues, hopefully will bring things in normal range by the help of Dr. Prabhu.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Sandesh displayed exceptional kindness by attentively listening to me and addressing all of my questions. Although he was slated to leave the hospital at 6 pm, he went above and beyond by personally visiting the ECG area and meticulously reviewing the reports of all patients, sparing us the need to return to the hospital unnecessarily.

A doctor with a pleasant and approachable nature to seek guidance from, i 
I highly recommend Dr Sandesh.

review: I went to Dr Prabhu because I was diagnosed with high cholesterol. The doctor was exceptionally friendly and explained everything in detail. I would absolutely recommend Dr Prabhu. The staff was very helpful as well.

review:
went to the doctor with a heavy heart and came back with a light , delightful , happy experience.
Actually I had ear infection (keratosis) for which I needed sugery and had to undergo a few clinical tests.one among that was ECG.and in the report it was mentioned I had Left atrial enlargement .I could not sleep the whole night was worried, restless till I met the doctor.once I met the doctor felt that he is down to earth person, explained every bit of my reports clearly.answered all my queries patiently and clearly.he gave nearly 30 min to explain everything.lastly consultation fee is also reasonable and doctor never wants you to undergo unnecessary tests
Had a very good experience suggest everyone to visit him
